response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. To ensure we both achieve a mutually beneficial outcome, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially partnering with you on this exciting endeavor.", "product_price": 9500}
